output_list.reason: The mintToken function allows anyone to mint tokens, which can lead to token devalue if not properly managed.
The freezeAccount function allows the owner to freeze or unfreeze accounts, which can lead to access control issues if not properly managed.
The setPrices function allows the owner to set the buy and sell prices, which can lead to access control issues if not properly managed.
The buy function allows users to buy tokens at the current buy price, which can lead to integer overflow if the buy price is too high.
The sell function allows users to sell tokens at the current sell price, which can lead to integer overflow if the sell price is too high.
